Title: Restore email - empty email field
Steps(Step): 1. Click "Send" button without entering email
Steps(Expected Results): 1. Error message "Email is required" is displayed

Title: Restore email - invalid email format
Steps(Step):
1. Enter invalid email format (e.g. test@test)
2. Click "Send" button
Steps(Expected Results): 1. Error message "Invalid email format" is displayed

Title: Restore email - valid email format
Steps(Step):
1. Enter valid email format (e.g. test@test.com)
2. Click "Send" button
Steps(Expected Results): 1. Email restore request is sent successfully

Title: Restore email - email already registered
Steps(Step):
1. Enter email already registered to the system
2. Click "Send" button
Steps(Expected Results): 1. Error message "Email already registered" is displayed

Title: Restore email - email not registered
Steps(Step):
1. Enter email not registered to the system
2. Click "Send" button
Steps(Expected Results): 1. Email restore request is sent successfully

Title: Restore email - web browser compatibility (Chrome)
Preconditions: User is logged in using Chrome browser
Steps(Step):
1. Enter valid email format (e.g. test@test.com)
2. Click "Send" button
Steps(Expected Results): 1. Email restore request is sent successfully

Title: Restore email - usability (label visibility)
Steps(Step): 1. Check if email field and send button labels are visible
Steps(Expected Results): 1. Email field and send button labels should be visible

Title: Restore email - usability (button accessibility)
Steps(Step): 1. Check if send button is accessible and clickable
Steps(Expected Results): 1. Send button should be accessible and clickable

Title: Restore email - usability (error message visibility)
Steps(Step):
1. Enter invalid email format
2. Click "Send" button
Steps(Expected Results): 1. Error message "Invalid email format" is displayed and visible

Title: Restore email - usability (input field autocomplete)
Steps(Step):
1. Enter valid email format once
2. Clear the email field
3. Enter the same email again
Steps(Expected Results): 1. Email field should autocomplete the email

Title: Restore email - usability (input field character limit)
Steps(Step):
1. Enter more than 255 characters in the email field
2. Click "Send" button
Steps(Expected Results): 1. Error message "Email address too long" is displayed

Title: Restore email - performance (response time)
Steps(Step): 1. Send email restore request
Steps(Expected Results): 1. Email restore request should be processed and responded within 5 seconds

Title: Restore email - performance (load testing)
Steps(Step): 1. Send multiple email restore requests simultaneously
Steps(Expected Results): 1. System should be able to handle the load and respond within acceptable time limits

Title: Restore email - security (SQL injection)
Steps(Step):
1. Enter SQL injection string (e.g. ' OR 1=1 -- )
2. Click "Send" button
Steps(Expected Results): 1. Error message "Invalid email format" is displayed and no SQL injection is executed

Title: Restore email - security (cross-site scripting)
Steps(Step):
1. Enter cross-site scripting string (e.g. <script>alert('XSS')</script>)
2. Click "Send" button
Steps(Expected Results): 1. Error message "Invalid email format" is displayed and no cross-site scripting is executed
